snippet: Shake Shack reported a net loss of $1.4 million in the fourth quarter, compared with a profit of $997,000 a year earlier.
abstract: Shake Shack reports quarterly net loss of $1.4 million, which it attributes to after-tax charge of $1.1 million related to its initial public offering in February.
lead_paragraph: Shake Shack reported a net loss of $1.4 million in the fourth quarter, compared with a profit of $997,000 a year earlier.

headline.print_headline: Shake Shack Reports Loss After I.P.O.-Related Charge
headline.main: Shake Shack Reports Loss After I.P.O.-Related Charge
